articles.author: Christine Idzelis, Vivien Lou Chen, Myra P. Saefong, Joy Wiltermuth
articles.title: Stock Market on Jan. 24, 2025: S&P 500 ends below record high as tech slumps, but posts big weekly gain along with Nasdaq and Dow after Trump's return to White House - MarketWatch
articles.description: Find all the U.S. market action for Friday here.
articles.content: Gold prices settled at their highest in three weeks on Friday, edging closer to a fresh record, with uncertainty around tariffs driving demand for precious metals, as there are no details if precious… [+813 chars]
